title: The Warrior : Caleb
description: Book 2 in the Sons of Encouragement series Behind the men who shaped history are the heroes who forever changed it. With her hallmark touches of brilliant prose and gripping characterizations, Francine Rivers tells the stories of men who faithfully sought after God in the shadows of God's chosen leaders. Joshua succeeded Moses as the nation's leader, but it was another man's zeal that pushed the people to put their faith into action: Caleb.
author: Francine  Rivers
